name: PCD_PAYMENT_CLASS
description: The PCD_PAYMENT_CLASS contains information about your payment classification definition records. The records included in this table are records from the PCD master file.

columns.name: PCD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the Payment Classification Definition (PCD) record.

columns.name: PCD_ID_PCD_NAME
columns.description: The group title of the payment classification.

columns.name: PCD_NAME
columns.description: The group title of the payment classification.
